author: James Tanner
method: For the guacamole, place all of the guacamole ingredients into a blender and pulse until combined but still slightly chunky. Heat a griddle pan and cook the pittas for 1-2 minutes on each side, until warmed through. To serve, place the guacamole into a serving bowl. Top with the sun-blushed tomatoes and sliced avocado and place the pitta breads alongside.
ingredients: ½ avocado, peeled, chopped,  2 tbsp plain yoghurt,  squeeze lemon juice,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  1 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  6 ready-made mini pittas, split,  3 sun-blushed tomatoes ,  ½ avocado, sliced, to garnish
